Home.s-4-card-1-question: How do I download and install the PARKIO app?
Home.s-4-card-1-answer: To download Parkio, visit the App Store (for iOS) or Google Play Store (for Android). Search for "Parkio" and follow the installation instructions.
Home.form-description: Have a question or need assistance? We're'here to'help! Please fill out the contact form, and our dedicated support team will get back to you as soon as possible.

Parkio-Solutions.Discover-the-power: Discover the power of PARKIO — your all-in-one solution for seamless and convenient parking experiences
Parkio-Solutions.Short-Term-Parking-Description: The Parkio app stands out as the ultimate solution for quick short-term parking sessions. Choose a recommended parking zone from the app's map or input the area code displayed on the sign. Afterward, spin the wheel within the app to designate the parking duration, confirm your selection, and commence your parking session!
Parkio-Solutions.SMS-Parking-Description: Parkio's SMS service offers a convenient way to park using text messages. No account creation is required, and you can settle the parking fee later through your chosen payment method. A charge of up to SEK 5 (plus potential operator costs) is applied for each parking session.
Parkio-Solutions.Digital-Permit-Descsription: The Parkio app simplifies the management of different permits, such as residential parking, yearly, monthly, and weekly permits. Handling these permits can be challenging due to diverse needs from residents, entrepreneurs, companies, and organizations, requiring tailored solutions. The good news is, there’s a more convenient and absolutely free way to manage permits with Parkio. Parkio provides electronic permits that...
Parkio-Solutions.Family-Account-Description: Experience the benefits of a Family account on Parkio, where you can efficiently centralize and oversee all family members' payments and receipts. The designated individual within your family initiates the account setup and extends invitations to up to 5 family members. All members of the family account are entitled to a 5% discount on their parking expenses. Embrace the convenience of collective management and savings. Isn't it delightful to be together, especially when it's both cost-free and financially advantageous?
Parkio-Solutions.Business-Parking-Description: Parkio’s solution for digital company parking offers a sophisticated and cost-effective approach to managing and calculating parking fees for employees on duty. Simplify the payment and administration of parking fees for multiple parking lots with a consolidated monthly bill. The more employees you link to your company account, the smoother the process of consolidating parking receipts into...
Parkio-Solutions.Guest-Parking-Description: Simplify visitor parking with Guest Parking! Enable visitors to use your company's permit, and let them manage parking independently via an iPad or computer at the reception. By adding Guest Parking to your permit service, you provide free parking for guests and streamline the process. Visitors can enter their registration number, set the parking duration, and opt for SMS reminders when needed. Say goodbye to manual permit distribution and enhance the parking experience for both employees and visitors.
Parkio-Solutions.Resident's-Parking-Description: Residents manage their parking permits seamlessly with Parkio resident parking. The system ensures that only authorized residents can independently purchase and administer their permits.

Business-Parking.Digital-company-parking-description: With the Parkio Business Account, you save time and energy managing the company’s parking. Take total control as an administrator, with the ability to determine who has access to parking privileges on the company’s account. Ensure that each receipt never gets lost or delayed. Additionally, our solution manages and calculates parking fees for your staff who drive on duty.
Business-Parking.Business-license-description: With the Parkio Business Account, you save time and energy managing the company’s parking. Take total control as an administrator, with the ability to determine who has access to parking privileges on the company’s account. Ensure that each receipt never gets lost or delayed. Additionally, our solution manages and calculates parking fees for your staff who drive on duty.
Business-Parking.Effortless-Parking-Management-descriptio: Empower your business with the Parkio Business Account dashboard. As a business owner, take charge effortlessly: manage parking access, control privileges, and ensure seamless administration. On the dashboard, easily add, edit, or delete employee license plates, ensuring efficient control and oversight of your company’s parking operations. Experience a streamlined solution where you can handle everything from one central hub.
Business-Parking.step-1-description: If you haven’t already, download the Parkio app from your preferred app store. Available for iOS and Android.
Business-Parking.step-2-description: Navigate to the 'Business Account' section within the Parkio app. Locate the 'Apply Now' button to access the dedicated application form.
Business-Parking.step-3-description: Fill in the necessary details, including company information, contact details, and any specific requirements. Ensure accuracy to expedite the application process.
Business-Parking.step-4-description: Carefully review the provided information to guarantee accuracy. Once satisfied, submit the application form. Our team will promptly review your request and contact you with further instructions.

How-it-works.Discover-how-to-use: Discover how to use the PARKIO app seamlessly for a convenient and stress-free parking experience
How-it-works.card-1-description: Begin your parking journey by selecting from recommended zones on the app’s map or simply input the displayed area code from on-site signs. Parkio ensures a seamless start to your parking experience!
How-it-works.card-2-description: Customize your parking experience by selecting the duration that suits you best. Use the intuitive wheel feature within the app to effortlessly spin and set your desired parking time. Whether it’s a short visit or a long stay, Parkio adapts to your schedule
How-it-works.card-3-description: Effortlessly confirm your parking selection and proceed to a seamless payment process. With secure transactions, Parkio ensures a convenient and safe experience
How-it-works.card-4-description: Stay in control by monitoring your active parking session. Receive notifications, extend your stay if needed, and enjoy peace of mind throughout your parking experience

FAQ.s-1-card-1-question: How do I download and install the PARKIO app?
FAQ.s-1-card-1-answer: To download Parkio, visit the App Store (for iOS) or Google Play Store (for Android). Search for "Parkio" and follow the installation instructions.

About-us.title: About
About-us.description: Welcome to Parkio, your trusted partner in smart parking solutions. At PARKIO, we're passionate about transforming the parking experience for businesses and individuals alike.
About-us.s-2-description: Empowering businesses and individuals with innovative parking solutions, making parking management simple, efficient, and stress-free.

About-us.s-3-description: Join the PARKIO community and experience a new era in parking convenience. Whether you’re a business owner seeking streamlined parking management or an individual looking for an efficient parking solution, PARKIO is here for you.
